scripts.test:chrome: cross-env browser=chrome npm test && npm run report
scripts.test: cucumber-js  --tags '@Login or @accountDetail or @updateIndustry or @closefunc or @continueIndustry or @creditProcess or  @debitProcess or  @creditFormClear or @debitFormClear' --require-module babel-core/register --require ./cucumber.conf.js --require ./step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:reports/cucumber.json
